name: Yacht Simulator VR
description: Yacht Simulator VR is the ultimate virtual reality yacht experience. Teleport around the exterior of a modern luxury yacht, play sports or dance with the girl of your dreams. Oculus and HTC support included.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 Storage: 470 MB available space
